# Script Documentation

## Scripts generated by NCBI EBot

The folowing scripts were generated by NCBI Ebot but modified to take an argument.

* searchpmc.pl
* searchpubmed.pl
* fetchPMCfulltext.pl
* fetchPubmedData.pl

## In house scripts

* convert2tsv.pl
* pulloutPMC.pl
* getPM2Author.pl
* mapPMC2PM.pl
